dcsl_miabot_joy.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 //Much of this code was copied from the ROS Tutorial for the joy package 
00002 
00003 #include <ros/ros.h>
00004 #include <geometry_msgs/Twist.h>
00005 #include <sensor_msgs/Joy.h>
00006 
00007 //\author: Brendan Andrade
00008 
00010 class TeleopMiabot
00011 {
00012 public:
00013   TeleopMiabot();
00014 
00015 private:
00016   void joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& joy);
00017 
00018   ros::NodeHandle nh_;
00019 
00020   int linear_, angular_;
00021   double l_scale_, a_scale_;
00022   ros::Publisher vel_pub_;
00023   ros::Subscriber joy_sub_;
00024 
00025 };
00026 
00028 TeleopMiabot::TeleopMiabot():
00029   linear_(1),
00030   angular_(2)
00031 {
00032   //Read parameters
00033   nh_.param("axis_linear", linear_, linear_);
00034   nh_.param("axis_angular", angular_, angular_);
00035   nh_.param("scale_angular", a_scale_, a_scale_);
00036   nh_.param("scale_linear", l_scale_, l_scale_);
00037 
00038   //Advertise topic
00039   vel_pub_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("cmd_vel",1);
00040 
00041   //Subscribe to joy
00042   joy_sub_ = nh_.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Joy>("joy", 10, &TeleopMiabot::joyCallback, this);
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00047 void TeleopMiabot::joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& joy)
00048 {
00049   geometry_msgs::Twist cmd_vel;
00050   cmd_vel.angular.z = a_scale_*joy->axes[angular_];
00051   cmd_vel.linear.x = l_scale_*joy->axes[linear_];
00052   vel_pub_.publish(cmd_vel);
00053 }
00054 
00055 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00056 {
00057   ros::init(argc, argv, "teleop_miabot");
00058   TeleopMiabot teleop_miabot;
00059 
00060   ros::spin();
00061 }
